lesson_description: Reinforce learning by connecting classroom instruction to individual problem solving and practice. MATHia serves as the primary instructional tool in these lessons.
learning_goals: I can work independently on my MATHia playlist and engage in activities to support my individual learning goals.

lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.title: Sharing is Caring
lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.description: Students analyze a real-world division situation and generate relevant questions about the situation.

lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.title: Personalized Learning and Intervention
lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.description:
### MATHia Playlist

#### Using the GCF to Rewrite the Sum of Two Numbers
Students investigate the Distributive Property, factoring the GCF from a sum. They analyze examples and rewrite sums using the Distributive Property.

### Clarify

#### Center A: MATHstream Interactive Video
Students complete the Greatest Common Factor MATHstream interactive video to revisit strategies for determining the greatest common factor of two numbers less than or equal to 100.

### Re-Teach

#### Center B: MATHstream Interactive Video
Students complete a MATHstream video based on the instruction they missed.
• Lesson 5 Composing and Decomposing Numbers
º Using GCF and LCM

lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.title: Learning Reflection
lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.description: Students reflect on the learning goals and MATHia workspaces they have engaged with in this topic.

materials_needed: If facilitating this lesson without student devices, no additional materials are needed.
To avoid printing additional materials not included in MATHbook (like Activate activities and Session Quick Checks) project them using the Present button above.
